summary: Edited face for our beloved housecarl, absolutely lore-friendly, I believe.
descriptionHtml:
Update:
I\'ve found the cause of problems with her facetint - it\'s Creation Kit bug - face attributes are not saving correctly and the solution is to export FaceGen data into external files. So I\'ve made another two archives - one for scar and one for non-scar versions. Use only one of them, if you\'ll use scar-patch with non-scar version, you will have scars on her anyway, and if you\'ll use nonscar-patch with scar version, you will have dark face unchanged. I recommend to install patches with Nexus Mod Manager - it will make installing, uninstalling and switching between versions much easier.

Description:
Lydia is a nice companion, but I \'m always had a feeling that her face is not good enough to match her beautiful spirit. So I did this modification for myself at first, but then decided to share it with Nexus, maybe it will be pleasing for somebody. Also I\'ve tried to make it lore-friendly as much as possible.
And it\'s my first mod as well as upload to Nexus so if I did something wrong tell me and I\'ll try to correct that.
And sorry for my English :D

Requirements:
For proper work you must have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] installed and for exact match with the screenshots you should install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Caliente\'s CBBE (both body and face pack)[/url] with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13377]Sporty body texture[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=515]More Freckles[/url]. Screenshots with ebony armor on her was made with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15105]Sharpshooters Extreme Graphics Vision ENB[/url] enabled.

Credits:
Thanks for creators of all mods listed above and special thanks to c_striker for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15963]Expanded Skyrim Presets[/url] which I\'ve used as a base.
author: Utherien
